name: The Near World
description:
Description

Nai, a 21-year-old girl, lives alone in Old City. The pressure of work and the scolding of her mother made her decide to give up everything. But she accidentally received an AI robot N-16. 

The appearance of N-16 is full of mysteries. What happened seven years earlier? Does this AI really have feelings?

Meeting people at the bar and forming a band to escape from the reality, It is your story in this bizarre city.

Language

Simplified Chinese 简体中文
